protein.general_function: Involved in acid-amino acid ligase activity
protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the covalent attachment of ubiquitin to other proteins (By similarity). Specific substrate for UBA6, not charged with ubiquitin by UBE1. May be involved in apoptosis regulation.

reference.reference_text: Jin J, Li X, Gygi SP, Harper JW: Dual E1 activation systems for ubiquitin differentially regulate E2 enzyme charging. Nature. 2007 Jun 28;447(7148):1135-8.
